::Spears::

She looked at Brix. "It's a good idea.  What do you think Striker? 
Can we risk it?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> "Using the parts would be easy, and yes we can do it. But getting 
> their, with the damage now, is going to be hard. I take two 
transport 
> pods and rearrange parts to make them one big one, with alot of 
> storage space. With double the engines, she can make it to 
> outerspace. The problem would be that she would burn up entering 
and 
> leaving the atmosphere. I would have to take a small piece of the 
> outer hull of the ark to cover it up with. Except that would leave 
it 
> even more disabled for a few hours. And their is the chance that it 
> will still burn up and the mission will be for nothing. But by the 
> looks of things it's our only hope. So this is what I suggest. You 
> two start getting together troops. I'll start making the pod. I'm 
> almpost done working on the CR Chambers, so I could start the pod 
> today. When my friend Fliq get out, he'll help me. In a few days 
when 
> I've put it all together, him and I will take it up, since it's our 
> project. You two take the troops and attack, or hold steady and 
> fortify, which ever you want. You give us a list of what to bring 
> back, and we search for it. What do you say?"
